text: Ludovic Orban (; born 25 May 1963) is a Romanian engineer and politician. He was the 68th Prime Minister of Romania from 4 November 2019 until 7 December 2020. "Ludovic Orban, prim-ministru desemnat" ("Ludovic Orban Designated Prime Minister"), Digi24, 15 October 2019; accessed October 15, 2019 He became leader of the National Liberal Party (PNL) in June 2017. Orban was Minister of Transport from April 2007 to December 2008 in the second Călin Popescu- Tăriceanu cabinet. He was also a member of the Romanian Chamber of Deputies for Bucharest from 2008 to 2016. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Romania
title: Ludovic Orban
